name: Rek'Sai
title: the Void Burrower
lore: An apex predator, Rek'Sai is a merciless Void-spawn that tunnels beneath the ground to ambush and devour unsuspecting prey. Her insatiable hunger has laid waste to entire regions of the once-great empire of Shurima—merchants, traders, even armed caravans, will go hundreds of miles out of their way to avoid her and her offspring's hunting grounds. All know that once Rek'Sai is seen on the horizon, death from below is all but guaranteed.
blurb: An apex predator, Rek'Sai is a merciless Void-spawn that tunnels beneath the ground to ambush and devour unsuspecting prey. Her insatiable hunger has laid waste to entire regions of the once-great empire of Shurima—merchants, traders, even armed...
allytips: Keeping tunnels spread out across the map will ensure you have choices when you want to cast Void Rush.
Cast Burrow before travelling around the map to take advantage of the increased Movement Speed and the safety provided by Tremor Sense.
Tremor Sense can warn you of enemies closing in, and is particularly useful when entering enemy territory.
enemytips: If you see one of Rek'Sai's tunnels, briefly stand on one of the entrances to destroy it.
Rek'Sai's Furious Bite gains damage as she builds Fury. Be very careful around her when her Fury is full.
When Rek'Sai is near, she can see the position of you and your allies, but only if you're moving.

riot_spells.name: Queen's Wrath / Prey Seeker
riot_spells.description:
Rek'Sai's next 3 basic attacks deal bonus Physical Damage to nearby enemies.

While Burrowed, Rek'Sai launches a burst of void-charged earth that deals Physical Damage and reveals enemies hit.
riot_spells.tooltip:
Un-Burrowed: Rek'Sai's next 3 basic attacks within 5 seconds deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus Physical Damage to nearby enemies.

Burrowed: Rek'Sai launches a burst of void-charged earth that explodes on first enemy hit, dealing {{ e4 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) Physical Damage and revealing non-stealthed enemies for {{ e6 }} seconds. If it hits a Champion, it also generates 25 Fury.

riot_spells.name: Burrow / Un-burrow
riot_spells.description:
Rek'Sai burrows into the ground, gaining new abilities and increased Movement Speed. Her vision range is reduced and she cannot use basic attacks.

While Burrowed, Rek'Sai may cast Un-burrow to knock up and damage nearby enemies.
riot_spells.tooltip:
Un-Burrowed: Burrow into the ground.

Burrowed: Un-burrow, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Physical Damage and knocking up the closest enemy for {{ e5 }} second. All other nearby enemies will be knocked back. An enemy who has been knocked up will be immune from further Un-burrow effects for {{ e6 }} seconds.

Burrowed Effects: New abilities, +{{ f1 }} Movement Speed, reduced vision range, disabled basic attacks, and gains Tremor Sense: Nearby enemies that move in Fog of War have their position revealed to Rek'Sai and her allies.

riot_spells.name: Furious Bite / Tunnel
riot_spells.description:
Rek'Sai bites her target, dealing double and True Damage if she has max Fury.

While Burrowed, Rek'Sai creates a re-usable, long lasting tunnel. Enemies can destroy it by standing on top of either entrance.
riot_spells.tooltip:
Un-Burrowed: Rek'Sai bites a target dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Physical Damage. At max Fury, the bite does 100% more and deals True Damage.

Maximum Damage: {{ f2 }}

Burrowed: Rek'Sai tunnels forward leaving two connected Tunnel Entrances. Clicking a Tunnel Entrance will make Rek'Sai dive to the other entrance.

Tunnel Entrances last for {{ e5 }} minutes and can be destroyed by enemies. Rek'Sai may have {{ e6 }} tunnels at one time. Tunnels have a {{ e8 }} second cooldown on use.

riot_spells.name: Void Rush
riot_spells.description: Rek'sai passively marks targets by damaging them. She can activate this ability to become briefly untargetable and lunge at a marked target for heavy damage based on their missing health.
riot_spells.tooltip:
Passive: Dealing damage to enemy Champions marks them for the next {{ preymarkduration }} seconds.

Active: Rek'Sai lets out a harrowing scream before burrowing underground seeking out a marked target. Moments later she leaps from underground, dealing {{ rbasedamagecalc }} physical damage plus {{ percentmissinghealthdamage }}% of their missing Health.

riot_passive.name: Fury of the Xer'Sai
riot_passive.description: While unburrowed Rek'Sai generates Fury with her basic attacks and spells. When burrowed Rek'Sai consumes Fury to heal herself.

i1.name: Fury of the Xer'Sai
i1.blurb: While unburrowed Rek'Sai generates Fury with her basic attacks and spells. When burrowed Rek'Sai consumes Fury to heal herself.
i1.description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Rek'Sai''' generates {{tip|fury|{{as|25 Fury}}}} upon dealing damage with [[basic attack]], {{ai|Prey Seeker|Rek'Sai}}, {{ai|Unburrow|Rek'Sai}} or {{ai|Furious Bite|Rek'Sai}}, and loses {{as|20 Fury}} per second if she hasn't generated any in the last 5 seconds.
i1.description2: While {{sbc|{{ai|Burrow|Rek'Sai|burrowed}}}}, '''Rek'Sai''' consumes her current {{as|Fury}} over 3 seconds, {{tip|healing}} up to {{sti|health|{{as|{{pp|20 to 190}} health}}}} at {{as|100 Fury}}, stopping once she consumes it all or returns to {{sti|health|{{as|full health}}}}.
i1.notes: * Fury bar changes from yellow to red when full.

q1.name: Queen's Wrath
q1.blurb: Rek'Sai's next 3 basic attacks deal bonus Physical Damage to nearby enemies.
q1.description: {{sbc|{{ai|Unburrow|Rek'Sai|Unburrowed}} - Active:}} '''Rek'Sai's''' next three basic attacks within 5 seconds deal {{tip|physical damage|{{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}}} to her target and all surrounding enemies. The damage to the primary target is affected by {{tip|critical strike}} modifiers.
q1.leveling: {{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|20 to 40}} {{as|(+ 50% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Total Damage|{{ap|20*3 to 40*3}} {{as|(+ 150% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
q1.notes:
* ''Queen's Wrath's'' bonus damage applies against turrets.
* ''Queen's Wrath'' ends and goes on cooldown if '''Rek'Sai''' is {{ai|Burrow|Rek'Sai|burrowed}} for more than 1 second.
* {{Pending for test}}: ''Queen's Wrath'' has a fixed attack animation forbidding ''Rek'Sai'' from attacking faster if she has over {{as|{{tt|{{fd|2.0}} attack speed|Estimated}}}}.
* ''Queen's Wrath's'' enhanced attacks apply other [[on-hit effect]]s, on-attack effects, and [[life steal]] but do not affect structures. The damage to additional targets is not affected by these.
* ''Queen's Wrath'' can be mitigated ({{tip|splash damage}} still applies) if {{ai|Aegis Protection|Pantheon|blocked}}, {{ai|Counter Strike|Jax|dodged}}, {{ai|Riposte|Fiora|parried}}, and/or if ''Rek'Sai'' is {{tip|blind|blinded}}.
* The splash damage does not apply {{ii|Hunter's Talisman}}.

q2.name: ''Prey Seeker''
q2.blurb: While Burrowed, Rek'Sai launches a burst of void-charged earth that deals Physical Damage and reveals enemies hit.
q2.description: {{sbc|{{ai|Burrow|Rek'Sai|Burrowed}} - Active:}} '''Rek'Sai''' fires a void-charged pulse in a target direction, stopping at the first enemy hit, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to enemies in the area and {{tip|sight|revealing}} them for {{fd|2.5}} seconds.

w1.name: Burrow
w1.blurb: Rek'Sai burrows into the ground, gaining new abilities and increased Movement Speed. Her vision range is reduced and she cannot use basic attacks.
w1.description: {{sbc|{{ai|Unburrow|Rek'Sai|Unburrowed}} - Active:}} '''Rek'Sai''' burrows into the ground, {{tip|disarm|self-disarming}} and reducing her sight radius to 250, but gaining {{pp|4|15 to 30|1 to 16|color=ms}} {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}}, becoming {{tip|ghosted}}, accessing an alternate set of basic [[Champion ability|abilities]], and activating ''Tremor Sense''.
w1.description2: {{sbc|Tremor Sense:}} '''Rek'Sai''' gains {{tip|obscured vision}} of nearby enemy and neutral units in fog of war every {{fd|1.5}} seconds if they are moving.
w1.notes:
* '''Rek'Sai''' Immediately burrows on respawn once she has at least one point in ''Burrow''.
* ''Burrow'' has no cast time and does not interrupt '''Rek'Sai's''' previous orders.
* Enemies detected by ''Tremor Sense'' are displayed as rings on the ground (champions display much larger ones and play a sound effect for ''Rek'Sai'').
** Enemies standing still while ''Rek'Sai'' is nearby are insensible to ''Tremor Sense''.
* ''Burrow'' briefly {{tip|slow|slows}} displaced enemies.

w2.name: Unburrow
w2.blurb: While Burrowed, Rek'Sai may cast Un-burrow to knock up and damage nearby enemies.
w2.description: {{sbc|{{ai|Burrow|Rek'Sai|Burrowed}} - Active:}} '''Rek'Sai''' bursts out of the ground, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to surrounding enemies and {{tip|airborne|knocking them aside}} 250 units. The enemy closest to the center is {{tip|airborne|knocked up}} for 1 second instead, and cannot be affected again by ''Unburrow'' for some time.
w2.description2: '''Rek'Sai''' can also trigger ''Unburrow'' by issuing an attack command, applying the full {{tip|airborne|knock up}} against her target.
w2.customlabel: {{tt|On-Target Cooldown|Unaffected by cooldown reduction (begins after the target is displaced)}}
w2.notes:
* ''Unburrow's'' per-target cooldown only applies to targets affected by the full {{tip|airborne|knock-up}}, but provides immunity to all effects of the ability.
* ''Unburrow'' has no cast time and does not interrupt '''Rek'Sai's''' previous orders.
* ''Unburrow'' is still considered an ability and is thus stopped by {{tip|silence}}. She can basic attack normally during this time, without leaving ''unburrow''.

e1.name: Furious Bite
e1.blurb: Rek'Sai bites her target, dealing double and True Damage if she has max Fury.
e1.description: {{sbc|{{ai|Unburrow|Rek'Sai|Unburrowed}} - Active:}} '''Rek'Sai''' bites the target enemy, dealing {{as|physical damage}}.
e1.description2: At maximum {{tip|fury|{{as|Fury}}}} the damage is doubled and converted to {{tip|true damage}}.

e2.name: Tunnel
e2.blurb: While Burrowed, Rek'Sai creates a re-usable, long lasting tunnel. Enemies can destroy it by standing on top of either entrance.
e2.description: {{sbc|{{ai|Burrow|Rek'Sai|Burrowed}} - Active:}} '''Rek'Sai''' {{tip|dashes}} in the cursor's direction, leaving behind a ''Tunnel'' with two interconnected entrances, lasting up to 10 minutes. The ''Tunnel'' can be traversed again if '''Rek'Sai''' targets either entrance, shutting down the ''Tunnel'' for a few seconds.
e2.description2: '''Rek'Sai''' can have up to 8 pairs of entrances active on the map at the same time. Enemy {{tip|champions}} can destroy a ''Tunnel'' by standing on either entrance for {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
e2.customlabel: {{tt|On-Target Cooldown|Unaffected by cooldown reduction (begins after Rek'Sai exits the tunnel)}}
e2.notes:
* ''Tunnel'' entrances can be targeted by allied movement abilities ({{ai|Leap Strike|Jax}}, {{ai|Shunpo|Katarina}}, {{ai|Safeguard|Lee Sin}}) and by {{si|Teleport}}.
* ''Tunnel'' entrances are visible on allied champions' minimaps, while enemies must first gain {{tip|sight}} of one before it becomes visible on theirs (the opposite entrance is not revealed).
* Enemy champions that destroy a ''Tunnel'' are each granted {{g|5}}.
** Destroying a ''Tunnel'' while ''Rek'Sai'' is traversing it will not prevent her from reaching the opposite entrance.
* ''Rek'Sai'' exits a ''Tunnel'' the same way she entered (either {{ai|Unburrow|Rek'Sai|Unburrowed}} or {{ai|Burrow|Rek'Sai|Burrowed}}, no switching).
** An {{ai|Unburrow|Rek'Sai|Unburrowed}} ''Rek'Sai'' is considered to be {{ai|Burrow|Rek'Sai|Burrowed}} while inside a ''Tunnel''. She will gain her {{ai|Burrow|Rek'Sai|Burrowed}} abilities (unusable) suffer from {{tip|nearsight}}, and activate ''Tremor Sense'', but will not be healed by {{ai|Fury of the Xer'Sai|Rek'Sai}} (unless {{ai|Burrow|Rek'Sai|Burrowed}} prior to entering the ''Tunnel'').
* ''Rek'Sai'' can ''Tunnel'' through walls if she dashes close to them and the wall is thin enough to allow the opposite entrance to spawn on the other side.

r1.name: Void Rush
r1.blurb: Rek'Sai dives underground and leaps towards her target, dealing massive damage.
r1.description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Rek'Sai's''' applies ''Mark as Prey'' to enemy champions she damaged in the last 5 seconds.
r1.description2: {{sbc|Active:}}  '''Rek'Sai''' selects an enemy champion with ''Mark as Prey'' and {{tip|vanish|vanishes}} into the ground. After {{fd|1.5}} seconds, she emerges from the ground near her target and {{tip|dash|pounces}} a fixed distance in their direction to deal {{as|physical damage}} ''if'' she hits them.
r1.leveling2: {{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|100 to 400}} {{as|(+ 175% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ {{ap|20 to 30}}% of target's '''missing''' health)}}}}
r1.description3: ''The damage can be dodged if the target moves 1500 units away.''
r1.notes:
* ''Rek'Sai'' can activate ''Void Rush'' while {{ai|Burrow|Rek'Sai|Burrowed}} or {{ai|Unburrow|Rek'Sai|Unburrowed}}.
* The target champion will glow once ''Rek'Sai'' {{ai|Burrow|Rek'Sai|Burrows}} to them, followed by a global screech (''will be heard by enemies even if they don't have {{tip|sight}} of '''Rek'Sai''' and/or her destination'').
